item.description:
This event is for anyone who would like a day @ the beach! before the evening festivities. I am scheduling these events as 2 separate meetups.


For anyone who would like a day at the beach? We will meetup @ 11:30am on the oceanside directly across from "L" St. and La Bec Rouge Bar & Restaurant. The beach is less congested at this end. I will be standing by the railing on the sidewalk directly over the sandy beach. To those who RSVP a "solid" yes, I will email you my cell #.


So, pack your coolers, towels, chair. Don't forget your beach toys! Let's have a fun day. There are meters , some on street parking ( I think?) and plenty of lots off Ocean Blvd. If you are interested in carpooling? Don't just add it to your RSVP.. Contact a member directly via their profile.

* NOTE: Obviously this event is weather permitting! Please check for a cancellation message if there is any chance of rain before heading out.This event has been cross posted with other meetup groups.*** We wait 10 minutes for "yes" RSVPs. We do not wait for "maybes."
item.how_to_find_us: The Oceanside directly across from "L" St. & La Bec Rouge (73 Ocean Blvd)
item.name: A Day @ The Beach - Hampton Beach NH
